p:
The impact of temperature on mortality was quantified, using generalized linear model (GLM) methodology, with the Poisson regression link. This methodology allows us to obtain the increase in the relative risk ( RR) of morbidity and daily mortality associated with an increase in the maximum daily temperature, and subsequently calculate the attributable risk ( AR) associated with this increase, via the following equation ( Coste and Spira, 1991):
AR =
RR − 1
RR
⋅ 100 .
